website_summaries.verdict: This budget-friendly bag gets your skis from point A to point B with few frills and no padding.
pros: The zipper is self-repairing and runs nearly the length of the bag
Bag holds a single pair of 185-centimeter skis
cons: Bag may be better suited for shorter skis

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk, wrapping it in a plastic bag is comparable
customer_reviews.text: So I have owned a lot of ski bags, like a lot of them. This is easily the worst most useless "bag" I have bought (I would say owned, but I'm in the process of returning it). There is no padding, it's small for any ski that is not a 70s style Slamon ski, that are essentially straight narrow boads. The material is flimsy, and close to wrapping your ski in a plastic bag. Looking for an alternative now.
customer_reviews.author: Merlot

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to spend much for a ski bag for my gear. This is a great bag for the price. Big enough that I can stored by skis plus my daughter's skis.
customer_reviews.author: Oskar Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Bagtastic
customer_reviews.text: Sweet bag, although my skis just barely fit in. Double-check your measurements. Of your skis.
customer_reviews.author: pnh230

customer_reviews.title: High Sierra Basic Ski Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, straps keep ski's from sliding around and handles make it super easy to carry. Bought this bag to protect ski's when packed in back of truck with other luggage, did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy P

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for general ski transport at this price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for general ski transport at this price. Not padded but well made and good stitching. Plenty of room for skis, poles, and I use extra clothes and towels to wrap my ski edges.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: A decent ski bag
customer_reviews.text: It did what I needed to for the moment, unfortunately, without wheels it didn't help me carry the skis and as a vertically challenged person, it wasn't easy to navigate. It's a good bag, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: good bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price - protected my skis just fine. I was concerned about padding because of the other reviews. I ended up packing a few towels and ski pants in the bag with the skis, they did fine flying across the country.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: decent value...
customer_reviews.text: Good bag at right price... Use for car trips, don't think it would work well for airline...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Looks like picture. I've knocked it around by throwing it on a bus full of student's equipment and it hasn't ripped or anything. Price was good for the amount of skiing I do and the quality of my skis (not super nice/new).
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Glisson

customer_reviews.title: Works well. for storing and light travel. There ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. for storing and light travel. There is no padding so suggest rapping skis in foam pad to protect ends when flying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hauling and Storing
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an inexpensive bag that my son could haul his gear to his junior high ski trips with. This is pretty perfect for that purpose. Price was a consideration and this thing is crazy cheap. No padding, so best for hauling the gear in cars and storing it in the winter. But for the money, this gets the job done. Just make sure to buy the right size for your skis. Not a lot to say about this bag other than it is inexpensive and it works. I always buy High Sierra stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good quality as I thought I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: My 184cm skis don't fit despite the specifications saying skis ...
customer_reviews.text: My 184cm skis don't fit despite the specifications saying skis up to 185cm will fit. My guess is the biggest skis that will fit are ~181-182cm.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Decloe

customer_reviews.title: not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This is sufficient. THe price is not as much as others. But hte bag is very cheap and will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: michael fuce

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. I use it to carry skis from car to hill, sometimes it's a long walk. Fits my poles too. Note length as it was too small for my older skis
customer_reviews.author: Coco Shops

product_meta.title: High Sierra Basic Ski Bag -Unpadded Ski Bag, Black - Large 185Cm
product_meta.description: The High Sierra Core Series is the essential hauler for your snow sport gear. This collection features high quality construction and durable fabrics with a back-to-basics approach perfect for any snow bound traveler.
feature_bullets: Main compartment with durable three-quarter length, self-repairing nylon-coil zipper holds a single pair of skis
Comes with poly bag and with full-color insert card packaging

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
